verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Wounded for me, wounded for me, There on the cross He was wounded for me; Gone my transgressions, and now I am free, All because Jesus was wounded for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Dying for me, dying for me, There on the cross He was dying for me; Now in His death my redemption I see, All because Jesus was dying for me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Risen for me, risen for me, Up from the grave He has risen for me; Now evermore from death’s sting I am free, All because Jesus has risen for me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Living for me, living for me, Up in the skies He is living for me; Daily He’s pleading and praying for me, All because Jesus is living for me.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Coming for me, coming for me, Soon in the air He is coming for me; Then with what joy His dear face I shall see, Oh, how I praise Him! He’s coming for me.
